mean_cn: n. 分遣队；  adj. 意外的，视情况条件而定的
mean_en: a group of soldiers who come from a particular army and are working together with soldiers from other armies
word_etyma: con共同 + ting接触 + ent形容词后缀 → 根据大家接触到的情况而定 → contingent 依条件而定的；分遣队
sentence: We sent a contingent of soldiers in to take control of the situation.
sentence_trans: 我们派了一批分遣队士兵控制局势。
